meanings.definition: To treat or regard with contempt.
meanings.sent1: She contemns anyone who is unkind to animals.
meanings.sent2: He contemns those who do not follow the rules.
meanings.sent3: The cat contemns the new brand of food by refusing to eat it.
meanings.sent4: His actions contemn the values he claims to uphold.
meanings.sent5: The teacher contemns cheating and always catches those who try.

meanings.sent1: The bully contemns anyone who is different from him.
meanings.sent2: She contemns people who are not as successful as her.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater contemns any food that is not prepared exactly how they like it.
meanings.sent4: His arrogant attitude contemns those who are less fortunate.
meanings.sent5: The queen contemns the idea of sharing her throne with anyone else.
